channel.title: Directly buy Crypto with Fiat
channel.description:
We’ve built a simple, yet game-changing application demo, connecting Stripe with an ERC-20 token, allowing for direct transactions between fiat and cryptocurrencies.

This is a companion discussion topic for the original entry at https://blog.mesg.com/directly-buy-crypto-with-fiat/
